basic.description:
Studies in modern and/or contemporary American fiction, poetry, and drama.
LEARNING HOURS    240 (72L;168P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: American Literature

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite  (ENGL200 & ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).
EXCL  No more than 6.0 units from ENGL375/6.0; 470/6.0
